pages.text: The creatures dubbed "$(thing)Creepers$()" which wander the $(thing)Climate Zones$() of the $(thing)Misty World$() at night, are well known for having more hostility than sense.$(br)They will attack humans indiscrimately, with the fatal flaw that their attacks are by way of suicidal explosion. Best to take care when ending their existence. Personally I like yelling "Ok Boomer!" at them.
